name: 光化學
description: Understanding electronic absorption spectra and it implication to Photochemistry.
goals: Understanding electronic absorption spectra and it implication to Photochemistry.
syllabus:
General photochemistry (2 weeks)

Spectroscopy of organic compounds (2 weeks)

Spectroscopy of inorganic compounds (3 weeks)

Quantum yield definition (2 weeks)

Lifetime and time-resolved spectroscopy (2 weeks)

Type of organic photochemistry (2 weeks)

Type of inorganic photochemistry (3 weeks)

grading.note: bases on student`s research report on problem solving which includes absorption and emission spectra and excited-state quantum yield and lifetime measurements.
